alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:34PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MCLENNAN...NORTHWESTERN LIMESTONE AND SOUTHEASTERN HILL COUNTIES... At 1034 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West, or 14 miles northeast of Lacy-Lakeview, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waco, Bellmead, Lacy-Lakeview, West, Mart, Hubbard, Coolidge, Hallsburg, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Lake Mexia, Fort Parker State Park, Northcrest, Gholson, Leroy, Mount Calm, Ross, Tehuacana, Malone, Penelope and Watt. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
